entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Wind becoming light before morning. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
